title: Filippo Guarducci
text:
Filippo Guarducci (born 25 August 1993) is an Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. His usual position is <a href="Flanker%20%28rugby%20union%29">Flanker</a>. He plays for <a href="Mogliano%20Rugby">Mogliano</a> in <a href="Top12">Top12</a> since 2012.
From 2012 to 2015 Guarducci was named in the <a href="Italy%20national%20under-20%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy Under 20</a> squad. In 2015 he was named in <a href="Italy%20A%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Emerging Italy</a> the for the annual <a href="World%20Rugby%20Tbilisi%20Cup">World Rugby Tbilisi Cup</a>.
